GR14ss6_priu:8745: dve nāmnī nanda-bhāryāyā yaśodā devakīti ca iti purāṇāntara-vacanaṃ ca tathā |

GR14ss6_priu:8846: dehādinairapekṣyaṃ caranti ācaranto dṛśyanta ity arthaḥ |

GR14ss6_priu:8854: atra tad-vakṣasi sthitā lakṣmī rekhaiva premerṣyayā sākṣāt tad-rūpatvenotprekṣitā |
GR14ss6_priu:8857: śrī-kṛṣṇa-sandeśo yathodāhṛtaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-sandarbhe bhavatīnāṃ viyogo me
GR14ss6_priu:8864: yoga-pratipādakaḥ sa ca duḥkhādau śamayitavye loka-rītyā sambhavatīty eke |

GR14ss6_priu:8868: atra yat tv aham ity ādau api smaratha naḥ sakhyaḥ svānām artha-cikīrṣayā
GR14ss6_priu:8869: gatān [BhP 10.82.42] ity ādi vakṣyamāṇānusāreṇa kāryāntarasyāpi bhavat-

GR14ss6_priu:8894: antaḥ-sa-kṣobheṇāpi rukṣa eva prahāso'yaṃ svāparādhaṃ kṣamayatā prapañcitaḥ |

GR14ss6_priu:8926: tatra ca tāsāṃ tathaivānubhavodeyo jāta ity āha adhyātma-śikṣaye [BhP 10.82.45] iti

GR14ss6_priu:8946: tasmin māsa-traya-saṃvāsātmake ca vaiśeṣṭyāntaram apy ūhyam |

GR14ss6_priu:8961: tās tāḥ kṣapā mayā hīnāḥ kalpa-samā babhūvuḥ [BhP
GR14ss6_priu:8962: 11.12.11] iti cātīta-prayogeṇa tadānīṃ virahasya nāstitvaṃ bodhitam |
GR14ss6_priu:8967: anu mahā-virahasya paścād yaḥ saṅgas tena baddha-dhiyaḥ satyaḥ paramānandāveśena tadānīṃ kim api nāvidan |
GR14ss6_priu:8970: asyārthāntaram api śrī-kṛṣṇa-sandarbhe kṛtam asti mat-kāmā ramaṇaṃ jāram [BhP 11.12.13] ity ādau tad-anantara-padye taṃ ca yādṛśaṃ prāpus tathā viśinaṣṭi |
GR14ss6_priu:8973: taṃ ca man-nitya-preyasī-lakṣaṇaṃ sva-svarūpam ajānantyo jāra-rūpaṃ pūrvaṃ prāpuḥ |

GR14ss6_priu:8979: neṣṭā yad aṅgini rase kavibhir paroḍhā tad gokulāmbujadṛśāṃ kulam antarena |

GR14ss6_priu:8997: evaṃ kadācid atha govindo rāmaś cādbhuta-vikramaḥ |
GR14ss6_priu:9012: tasmāt tadānīṃ sakhyollāsa-dhāriṇā śrī-rāmeṇāpi yutiḥ saṅgataiva |
GR14ss6_priu:9013: vane rātryām iti pāṭhas tu kvācitka eva |
GR14ss6_priu:9014: tatra ca vrajāntastham eva vanaṃ jñeyam |
GR14ss6_priu:9017: tatrārabhata govindo rāsakrīḍām anuvrataiḥ [BhP 10.33.2] ity ādi |
GR14ss6_priu:9018: jala-krīḍā-- so 'mbhasy alaṃ yuvatibhiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ [BhP 10.33.23] ity ādi |
GR14ss6_priu:9027: iyaṃ ca śrī-kṛṣṇa-candrasyojjvala-līlā rāsa-sambandhiny apy anantatvena sammatā-- evaṃ śaśāṅkāṃśu-virājitā niśāḥ [BhP 10.33.25] ity ādau |
GR14ss6_priu:9029: sarva-saubhāgyavatīm ūrdhva-maṇeḥ śrī-rādhikāyāḥ sambandhinīṃ līlāṃ varṇayanti -
GR14ss6_priu:9033: yan no vihāya govindaḥ prīto'yam anayad rahaḥ ||
GR14ss6_priu:9035: yān brahmeśo ramā devī dadhur mūrdhny aghanuttaye ||
GR14ss6_priu:9036: tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ padāni yat |
GR14ss6_priu:9038: na lakṣyante padāny atra tasyā nūnaṃ tṛṇāṅkuraiḥ |
GR14ss6_priu:9045: keśaprasādhanaṃ tv atra kāminyāḥ kāminā kṛtam |
GR14ss6_priu:9046: tāni cūḍatayā kāntām upaviṣṭam iha dhruvam || [BhP 10.30.27-34]
GR14ss6_priu:9051: na lakṣyanta iti tāḥ khedayantīnāṃ sakhīnām |
GR14ss6_priu:9058: yā tu vilokyārtāḥ samabruvan [BhP 10.30.26] iti sarvāsām evārtir uktā sāpi svasyotkaṇṭhāviśeṣeṇa sarvatra saṅgacchata eva
GR14ss6_priu:9060: tatra tasyāḥ śrī-vṛndāvaneśvaryā līlāyāṃ prāk-pradarśitam apy eṇapatnī [BhP 10.30.11] ity-ādi-dvayaṃ cānusandheyam ||
GR14ss6_priu:9061: tatra vistara-śaṅkāto yā yā vyākhyā na vistṛtā |
GR14ss6_priu:9063: tad evam anena sandarbheṇa śāstra-prayojanaṃ vyākhyātam |
GR14ss6_priu:9065: ālībhiḥ paripālitaḥ pravalitaḥ sānandam ālokitaḥ pratyāśaṃ sumanaḥ-phalodaya-vidhau sāmodam āmoditaḥ |
GR14ss6_priu:9068: tādṛśa-bhāvaṃ bhāvaṃ prathayitum iha yo'vatāram āyātaḥ |
GR14ss6_priu:9075: prītyākhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ sandarbhaḥ samāptim iha saṅgataḥ ||
